        Get the currently used socket factory.

      • setSocketFactory

        public void setSocketFactory(SocketFactory p_socketFac)
        Set the socket factory to be used by this client.
        Parameters:
        p_socketFac - The socket factory that should be used, or null if the default factory should be used.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Free all network resources that are no longer needed by this client.

        Note: subsequent method invocations on client interfaces will acquire new resources, so this method has to be called again.

        Specified by:
        dispose in interface JaffreClient
        Overrides:
        dispose in class AbstractSocketJaffreClient
